p: Follow-up studies by the Yale/George Mason group have monitored how the proportion of respondents in each segment has changed across time [ 4â€“ 14]. Segment proportions fluctuated somewhat over the 8-year period from 2008 to 2016, but there was no strong temporal trend toward increasing denial or acceptance of climate change. By 2016, membership of the Alarmed segment had increased after a slump and returned to 2008 levels.
